articles.title: Microsoft, Google, Oracle, Amazon to share $9B Pentagon cloud computing contract
articles.description: Microsoft, Oracle, Google and Amazon will share a $9 billion contract to provide the Department of Defense with cloud computing systems.
articles.content:
The Department of Defense, led by Secretary Lloyd Austin, has awarded a $9 billion contract for cloud computing systems to Oracle, Google, Amazon and Microsoft. File Photo by Lisa Ferdinando/DoD/UPI | License Photo
Dec. 8 (UPI) -- Microsoft, Oracle, ... [1377 chars]

articles.title: DeepMind’s latest AI project solves programming challenges like a newb
articles.description: Google's AI division tackles programming languages with a language model.
articles.content: Google's DeepMind AI division has tackled everything from StarCraft to protein folding. So it's probably no surprise that its creators have eventually turned to what is undoubtedly a personal interest: computer programming. In Thursday's edition of S... [2959 chars]

articles.title: Digital driver's license
articles.description: Google's December Play System Updates readies a digital driver's license beta for Android's Wallet app and preps for the Pixel Tablet.
articles.content:
Google’s December Play System Updates ready a beta test for keeping a digital driver’s license in your Android phone’s Wallet app while also preparing for next year’s Pixel Tablet.
